text: Lőrinc Galgóczi (born September 24, 1911, date of death unknown) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches. ==References== ==External links== *Profile Category:1911 births Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary Category:Year of death missing
title: Lőrinc Galgóczi
